projects.title: HR Management
projects.description: A webesite page that i worked on using JS, HTML5, CSS3 where it shows the data of a certain company employees as cards with their data on it, i got involved with so many different wasy of coding during the process which gave me experience in how to deal with DOM.

projects.title: Restaurant Menu
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for making a page that takes user info inside of a form and these info entered as a table so the user can look at his choices all at once like a menu.

projects.title: Horned Beasts
projects.description: My first app using React tecchnology and Bootstrap. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows Cards of different Horned Beasts that can you vote for you favorite ones by clicking on them and also a Modal with info can be shown once clicked on the Modal button and I added a form which filters th Beasts by their number of horns so people can see which Beasts have a specific number of horns.
